title: Remove name tags from collision groups in URDF model files

content.raw:
The non-standard use of group names for the collision geometries of various parts of the robot (atlas.urdf, Sandia hands etc.) leads to various tools spamming the following everytime a model is loaded:


```
#!

[ WARN] [1420637866.177538171, 403.452000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177570627, 403.452000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177628287, 403.452000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177688207, 403.453000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177741757, 403.453000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177842462, 403.453000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177890283, 403.453000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
```



Unless there is a compelling reason to keep them, I'd vote for removing the name tags. See also discussion on [robot_model github issue 18](https://github.com/ros/robot_model/issues/18).

The non-standard use of group names for the collision geometries of various parts of the robot (atlas.urdf, Sandia hands etc.) leads to various tools spamming the following everytime a model is loaded:

[ WARN] [1420637866.177538171, 403.452000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177570627, 403.452000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177628287, 403.452000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177688207, 403.453000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177741757, 403.453000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177842462, 403.453000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.
[ WARN] [1420637866.177890283, 403.453000000]: The notion of a group name for collision tags is not supported by URDF.

Unless there is a compelling reason to keep them, I'd vote for removing the name tags. See also discussion on robot_model github issue 18.
